commands.name: az devops security group membership add
commands.syntax:
az devops security group membership add --group-id
                                        --member-id
                                        [--detect {false, true}]
                                        [--org]

commands.name: az devops security group membership list
commands.summary: List memberships for a group or user.
commands.syntax:
az devops security group membership list --id
                                         [--detect {false, true}]
                                         [--org]
                                         [--relationship {memberof, members}]

commands.name: az devops security group membership remove
commands.syntax:
az devops security group membership remove --group-id
                                           --member-id
                                           [--detect {false, true}]
                                           [--org]
                                           [--yes]
